properties.name: The number of CPU cores to allocate.
properties.description: • The number of CPU cores to allocate.

properties.name: The amount of memory to allocate in megabytes.
properties.description: • The amount of memory to allocate in megabytes.

properties.name: Specifies which datacenter the instance is to be provisioned in.
properties.description: • Specifies which datacenter the instance is to be provisioned in.

properties.name: true
properties.description: • Specifies the billing type for the instance. When true, the computing instance will be billed on hourly usage, otherwise it will be billed on a monthly basis.

properties.name: true
properties.description: • Specifies the disk type for the instance. When true, the disks for the computing instance will be provisioned on the host which it runs, otherwise SAN disks will be provisioned.

properties.name: Specifies whether or not the instance must only run on hosts with instances from the same account
properties.description: • Specifies whether or not the instance must only run on hosts with instances from the same account

properties.name: An identifier for the operating system to provision the computing instance with.
properties.description: • An identifier for the operating system to provision the computing instance with.

properties.name: blockDeviceTemplateGroup.globalIdentifier
properties.description: • Conditionally required - Disallowed when blockDeviceTemplateGroup.globalIdentifier is provided, as the template will specify the operating system.

properties.name: A global identifier for the template to be used to provision the computing instance.
properties.description: • A global identifier for the template to be used to provision the computing instance.

properties.name: operatingSystemReferenceCode
properties.description: • Conditionally required - Disallowed when operatingSystemReferenceCode is provided, as the template will specify the operating system.

properties.name: Specifies the connection speed for the instance's network components.
properties.description: • Specifies the connection speed for the instance's network components.

properties.name: Specifies whether or not the instance only has access to the private network. When true this flag specifies that a compute instance is to only have access to the private network.
properties.description: • Specifies whether or not the instance only has access to the private network. When true this flag specifies that a compute instance is to only have access to the private network.

properties.name: Specifies the network VLAN which is to be used for the front end interface of the computing instance.
properties.description: • Specifies the network VLAN which is to be used for the front end interface of the computing instance.

properties.name: Specifies the network VLAN which is to be used for the back end interface of the computing instance.
properties.description: • Specifies the network VLAN which is to be used for the back end interface of the computing instance.

properties.name: Block device and disk image settings for the computing instance
properties.description: • Block device and disk image settings for the computing instance
• Default: The smallest available capacity for the primary disk will be used. If an image template is specified the disk capacity will be be provided by the template.

properties.name: Arbitrary data to be made available to the computing instance.
properties.description: • Arbitrary data to be made available to the computing instance.

properties.name: SSH keys to install on the computing instance upon provisioning.
properties.description: • SSH keys to install on the computing instance upon provisioning.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) A descriptive name used to identify an SSH key.

properties.name: notes
properties.description: (Optional) A small note about an SSH key to use at your discretion.
